items.sentence: I am ashamed because I didn't win in football.

A marsh is like a swamp.

The opposite of smooth is coarse.
Affect is almost always a verb meaning 'to influence' or 'to change'.
effect is almost always a noun meaning 'the result' or 'the consequence' of something
